1382153932332539905.text: To help pay for his “infrastructure” plan, @POTUS is proposing one of the biggest tax hikes in American history, totaling roughly $2.1 trillion. These tax increases will lower wages, undermine economic growth, make America less competitive & hurt our economy.

1382153931200028680.text: Moreover, just $115 billion goes towards our nation’s roads and bridges. That’s less than 5%. It spends more on nursing homes ($400 billion) and schools and daycare ($137 billion) than it does on roads and bridges.

1382153930105356291.text: The Biden plan costs about $2.7 trillion, but only about $600 billion is directed toward traditional infrastructure like roads, bridges, transit, rail, and ports. That’s just 20% of the overall plan.

1382153929111310337.text: President Biden’s massive $2.7 trillion “infrastructure” plan is filled with broad policy priorities that are a far cry from what has ever been defined as infrastructure, by either Democrats or Republicans.

1382153927760695299.text: I have long believed in and advocated for investing more in our nation’s infrastructure, including modernizing our roads, bridges, transit, ports and more. But we should focus on our core infrastructure needs to help grow our economy.
